title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Crisp bacon in a pan, then remove from heat.
Whisk eggs with grated Parmesan and plenty of black pepper.
Toss hot pasta with bacon, then quickly stir in egg-cheese mixture off heat.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, then grill or pan-sear until browned.
Simmer tomato sauce with butter, garlic, and ginger.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce and cook until tender.
Stir in cream and adjust seasoning.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and colorful mix of vegetables tossed in a savory soy-ginger sauce.
instructions: Chop vegetables into bite-size pieces.
Heat a wok or skillet and add a little oil.
Stir-fry vegetables over high heat until crisp-tender.
Add soy sauce, garlic, and ginger; toss to coat.
Finish with a splash of sesame oil and serve hot.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Seasoned ground beef served in crispy taco shells with fresh toppings.
instructions: Cook ground beef in a skillet until browned.
Stir in taco seasoning with a splash of water and simmer briefly.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
Fill shells with beef and top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream.
Serve immediately.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A refreshing salad with tomatoes, cucumber, olives, feta cheese, and oregano.
instructions: Chop tomatoes and cucumber; thinly slice red onion.
Combine vegetables and olives in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice; season with oregano, salt, and pepper.
Top with crumbled feta.
Toss gently and serve chilled.
